Repeat execution

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "fix(types): contravariant generic default in ComponentOption" (#7369) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
**What kind of change does this PR introduce?** (check at least one)

- [x] Bugfix


**Does this PR introduce a breaking change?** (check one)

- [ ] Yes
- [x] No

**Other information:**

Fix bugs spotted in https://github.com/vuejs/vue-test-utils/pull/317#discussion_r159149553.

Some type theory shenanigans below:

This pull request allows assigning `ComponentOption` of a Vue subclass to `Component`. The problem is that we used to mark default vm type  as `Vue` in `Component`. However, since `ComponentOption` is contravariant against vm type `V`. The default bound should not be the upper bound `Vue`, but the lower bound `never`.

For a more concrete example, consider this usage:

```ts
interface MyComponent extends Vue {
   num: number;
 }
 
const option: ComponentOptions<MyComponent> = {
  // a lifetime method
  created(this: MyComponent) { return this.num.toFixed() }
}
```

Then, assigning option to `ComponentOption<Vue>`, we could in theory do unsafe operation:

```ts
const anotherOption: ComponentOptions<Vue> = option

anotherOption.created.call(new Vue) // error! no property num on Vue!
```

Though it is not how we really use Vue, type checker cannot know this. To workaround, we can mark  `anotherOption` to have vm type as `never`.  `never` is the bottom type of any type, so `ComponentOption<never>`'s `create` method can accept nothing, and thusly any `create` method from subclass can satisfy _accepting nothing_ semantic. In practical words, this means we promise that we **never** use `created` like the way above.

<!--
Please make sure to read the Pull Request Guidelines:
https://github.com/vuejs/vue/blob/dev/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request-guidelines
-->

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "安卓端v-model未对CompositionEvent进行相关处理" (#7367) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.5.13

### Reproduction link
[https://codepen.io/LeuisKen/pen/ZvydmK?editors=1010](https://codepen.io/LeuisKen/pen/ZvydmK?editors=1010)

### Steps to reproduce
1、安卓端Chrome 63，选择输入框；
2、使用IME，示例中为谷歌日语输入法；
3、输入内容。

![screenrecorder-2018-01-03-11-22-53-570](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7701575/34508361-4a714380-f079-11e7-8ebb-e38fa8c6125f.gif)

### What is expected?
仅在输入结束，即：compositionend事件触发时，更新数据，参考issue：
https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/5158#issuecomment-286133373

### What is actually happening?
详见重现步骤中的截图，未完成拼字的情况下，v-model同步了输入的值。

---
建议使用`window.CompositionEvent`代替代码 https://github.com/vuejs/vue/blob/dev/src/platforms/web/runtime/directives/model.js#L42 中的`isAndroid`判断。

关联issue：https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7361

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "element-ui@2.0.10 requires a peer of vue@^2.5.2 but none was installed. " (#7366) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:

i create  a project by -cli。 The version is 2.5.2..now ，i want to use element-ui 。
write npm install element-ui --save 。。 get error: element-ui@2.0.10 requires a peer of vue@^2.5.2 but none was installed. 
![show](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24582248/34508152-759aaa26-f077-11e7-9abf-a9ac2f1e635e.png)
 how  can i resolve it?
